data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: There's no talent here, this is hard work. This is an obsession.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: Excellence is not a skill. Excellence is an attitude.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: Doubt is only removed by action. If you're not working then that's where doubt comes in.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: When you are about to quit remember why you started.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: The more you seek the uncomfortable, the more you will become comfortable.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: Losers focus on winners. Winners focus on winning.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: Failure is not an option for me. Success is all I envision.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: I never lose. Either I win or I learn.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: Be passionate. Be optimistic. Be grateful.

data.author: Richard Branson
data.quote: If your dreams don't scare you, they are too small.

data.author: Richard Branson
data.quote: Spend more time smiling than frowning and more time praising than criticising.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

data.author: George Addair
data.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

data.author: C.S. Lewis
data.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.

data.author: Roy T. Bennett
data.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.

data.author: Paulo Coelho
data.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down. It’s whether you get up.

data.author: Brian Tracy
data.quote: Your true success in life begins only when you make the commitment to become excellent at what you do.

data.author: Chantal Sutherland
data.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.
